name: Loving You Fully
description:
Bianca is an 18-year-old girl with the dream of going to medical school, owning a flower shop, and eventually, finding love. However, there's one big hurdle that she's constantly reminded of that preventing her from doing all three: her body. When she feels like she can't go anywhere in life because of how she looks, she discovers Jasmine, a plus-size model who exudes the energy that Bianca only dreams of. Will she be the one to help Bianca?

Features

  • An Original Soundtrack
  • Two font options: Default and OpenDyslexic. OpenDyslexic is a dyslexic-friendly font.
  • A 30 minute experience about body positivity and learning to love yourself.

Made For the Valentine's Jam 2021.

Team

Project Lead/Writer: Kristi Jimenez

Programmer: Foleso

Composer: LGM

Sprite & Cg Artist: MirukiMary

Background Artist: Fuyunokawa

GUI Artist: Sayumi101

Logo Artist: Katy133

Proofreaders: Gabtheirartistheirart, Becca Iris Ruiz, & Camelle Gregoire
